txt.en: 'The bands of enemies hesitate. Let us speak for a moment.'
'Foes spotted, just ahead!'
'More enemies on the plains ahead!'
'Ready your weapon, another surge of invaders!
'The enemy riders rally ahead of us.'
'Look foward! They are trying to break through our defences!'
'Brace yourself, they prepare to strike once more!'
'Hold and speak with me for a moment!'
'Enemy riders on the ridge! Don't let them past!'

'The initial surge of riders has been dealt with, and I will be able to hold the North-east edge on my own.\n\n'Nothwulf was protecting the perimeter of the farms a short distance to the south, I would ask that you see to his success there.'

'We still hold the southern edge intact, the enemy shall not penetrate from this side while I remain vigilant.\n\n'The enemy will try to find another way around our defences. Osin will need your aid to the west, while I remain behind to watch the flank.'
'Elfmar holds the east? Then we must defend the other borders! Will you ride out to meet the enemy at my side?'

'Exceptional work at the borders, [placeholder]. Few Orcs have made it this far into the village.\n\n'I noticed a few of the invaders shouting about their war-chieftains, commanding from just north of the mead hall. Defeat this Urbhár and this Botglim, and throw the attacking force into chaos.'

'The invading forces are in utter disarray. The loss of their leaders has caused great chaos, resulting in many of their riders and infantry retreating back north, towards Elthengels.\n\n'The Elfward continue to drive back those intent on pursuing the assault, but I believe we have saved the village and its people.'
Thane Elfmar has been defeated
'I will gather up the others when the last enemy has been driven back, and we can discuss matters when all is quiet again.'
Elfmar has asked you to aid Nothwulf to the south-west

'The enemy forces have reached the threshold of Faldham. The Elfward have  taken up positions around the perimeter to defend our borders, but they will need your assistance.\n\n'I expect the first waves to come from the north. Ride with me as we watch the northern borders. Take courage, and fight well.'
Nothwulf is prepared to defend the southern border
'I am pleased to have you along with me, [placeholder]. Let us show these invaders the merit of the Elfward!'
Nothwulf has been defeated
'To the west, I spotted several bands of Orcs headed towards Faldham. They seem to be pressing from every flank.\n\n'I came at once. I require your aid if we are to dispose of the attacking foes.'
Nothwulf has asked you to aid Osin defend to the west
Osin has been defeated
Langfrith believes the invading commanders can be found north of the mead hall

Thane Elfmar has gathered the Elfward and prepared for a strike against the village of Faldham. The Rohirrim intend to defend against the waves of Orcs and Uruks without the aid of Athelward or Théoden's riders.
Urbhár has been defeated
Botglim has been defeated
Defeat Botglim, the Uruk commander
Speak to Thane Elfmar at the mead hall gates
Defend Faldham with the help of Thane Elfmar
Speak to Thane Elfmar
Speak to Nothwulf along the road to the south-west
Ride with Nothwulf to defend the southern perimeter
Wait for Osin to approach
Speak with Nothwulf about the defences
Ride with Osin to defend the south-west edge of Faldham
Speak to Langfrith guarding the mead hall gates
Defeat Urbhár, the Orc commander
Elfmar remains ready, just north of the road fork at the north edge of Faldham.\n\nThe defence against the White Hand forces has begun, and Thane Elfmar seems both confident and prepared.
The enemy forces have been routed
Elfmar remains ready, just north of the road fork at the north edge of Faldham.\n\nThane Elfmar wishes to speak with you about the defences of Faldham.
Nothwulf can be found to the south-west, along the road near the southern farms.\n\nElfmar has asked you to aid Nothwulf defend the southern perimeter.
Nothwulf can be found to the south-west, along the road near the southern farms.\n\nNothwulf will need your aid to defend the southern perimeter.
Nothwulf awaits at the southern edge of Faldham.\n\nNothwulf wishes to speak about the ongoing defence of the town.
Osin has approached Nothwulf from the west
Langfrith defends the gate to the mead hall of Faldham.\n\nLangfrith has been guarding the mead hall entrance, and Osin believes that he may need your assistance.
'More of those foul invaders are in our path, [placeholder].'
Urbhár and Botglim can be found north of the mead hall.\n\nLangfrith believes that defeating the commanders of the invaders, Urbhár and Botglim, may disrupt the ongoing assault.
'Stay alert, I hear more of them approaching.'
Elfmar and members of the Elfward await at the opening to the mead hall of Faldham.\n\nElfmar and the Elfward must be notified that you have defeated the commanders of the attacking army.
'Well done! Speak to Langfrith outside the mead hall, and see what aid he needs, [placeholder].'
'We are fortunate that the Nink-hai Orcs have been unable to interfere with our defence!'
'The enemy warleaders have sent a pack of riders to approach from the south. We must stop them.'
'I hope that my men are prepared for this, and that the crofters remain safe within our defences.'
'May fortune favour you. I depart to protect the eastern farms.'
'Make haste, friend! Langfrith awaits at the mead hall entrance, to the north.'
Instance: The Defence of Faldham
